it.unibas.trikc.coverage

Class Loader

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibas.trikc.coverage.Loader

  • public class Loader
extends java.lang.Object
    Instance of the singleton pattern. It allows to explore the structure of the SUT It is also responsible for initializing the MemoryClassLoader
    Author:
    TeamCoverage
